explains: n. 暂停，中止；（金融）延期偿付

sentences.en: The House voted to impose a one-year moratorium on nuclear testing.
sentences.cn: 议会投票要强行暂停核试验一年。

sentences.en: The convention called for a two-year moratorium on commercial whaling.
sentences.cn: 会议呼吁两年内暂停商业捕鲸活动。

sentences.en: Ever since there has been a tacit moratorium on executions.
sentences.cn: 自那以后就达成了暂停执行死刑的默契。
